titlestmt.titleproper: Preliminary Guide to the Operations Research Department records , 1967-1990 RG0097
titlestmt.author: Special Collections Research Center, The George Washington University

publicationstmt.publisher: Special Collections Research Center, The George Washington University

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2022-01-11 11:52:39 -0500.

repository.corpname: Special Collections Research Center, The George Washington University

origination.label: Creator
origination.corpname: George Washington University. Operations Research Department

did.abstract: Materials in this collection include course project files, operations research courses, student files, committees, department meetings, honors societies, course outlines, day files (1967-90), qualifying examinations, Omega Rho form letters, publicacations, assorted writings by School of engineering and Applied Science and School of Government and Business Administration, (1980-86). The collection covers the years 1967 to 1990.

prefercite.head: Preferred citation
prefercite.p: Please cite unpublished materials in the following way:

Please provide the title and date of item, catalog number (if applicable it will be found written on the folder), name of the collection, name of the repository, and location of the repository. Example: James Oglethorpe to the Trustees, 13 January 1876, RG0001 Series 1, Box 4, Folder 3. Records of the Board of Trustees, Special Collections Research Center, Gelman Library, The George Washington University, Washington, D.C.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Acquisition information is unknown for this collection.

userestrict.head: Restrictions on Use
userestrict.p: Some material may be copyrighted or restricted. It is the patron's obligation to determine and satisfy copyright or other case restrictions when publishing or otherwise distributing materials found in the collections.

bioghist.head: Historical or Biographical Note
bioghist.p: Operations Research was a former department with the School of Engineering and Applied Science. Today the school is made up of the Civil and Enfironmental Engineering, Computer Science, Electrical and Computer Engineering, bioengineering, Engineering Management and Systems Engineering, Mechanical and Aerospace Engineering

scopecontent.head: Collection Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: Materials in this collection include course project files, operations research courses, student files, committees, department meetings, honors societies, course outlines, day files (1967-90), qualifying examinations, Omega Rho form letters, publicacations, assorted writings by School of engineering and Applied Science and School of Government and Business Administration, (1980-86). The collection covers the years 1967 to 1990.

arrangement.head: Collection Organization
arrangement.p: This collection is not processed and has been preliminarily organized into four series: Course Project Files; Student and department files; Exams, letters, and publications; and Assorted writings.

Examinations

Foggy Bottom (Washington, D.C.)
controlaccess.corpname: George Washington University. School of Government and Business Administration
George Washington University. School of Engineering and Applied Science

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: This series consists of course project files, include operations research courses (191, 291, 298, 391, 398).
The material range in date from 1973-85.
This series has a paper container list in the reading room, please ask staff for assistance.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: This series consists of student files, committees, department meetings, honors societies, course outlines, and day files.
The materials range in date from 1967-90.
This series has a paper container list in the reading room, please ask staff for assistance.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: This series consists of qualifying examinations, omega rho form letters, and publications.
The materials range in date from 1968-85.
This series has a paper container list in the reading room, please ask staff for assistance.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: This series consists of assorted writings by school of engineering and applied science and school of government and business administration.
The materials range in date from 1980-86.
This series has a container list in electronic form, please ask staff for assistance.
